name: Vs. Stev Hervy (Low End PC/Modded Switch Port)
name_original: Vs. Stev Hervy (Low End PC/Modded Switch Port)
description:
Switch:  

1. Ensure homebrew is installed

2.  Extract to switch's sd card

3. Open the .nro via homebrew menu

Pc:

1.  Download love2d from love2d.org

2. Download the lovefile

3. Open the .love file

Chromebook/android:

1. Download love2d from here

2. Download the lovefile

3. Open the .love file  with love2d
